name: Apple a Day
description:
Play as John TruckerHat and keep as many docs away as you can. Tap on the left side of the screen to move and the right side to toss an apple. Collect different types of apples and run as long as possible.

The game is in Beta and needs work. we are adding enemies, apples, leader boards, achievements, story and more. Play the arcade hit in the making.

W,S to move and space to toss an apple or touch the left and right side of screen if using touch controls.

the art is from devils workshop
